## StyleDictionaryConfig interface

Config for Style Dictionary

Style Dictionary is used as `WriterTool` and `BuilderTool` - yet there is only the part of `writer` you can further parametrize.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface StyleDictionaryConfig extends ToolConfig 
```
<b>Extends:</b> ToolConfig
